title: Blossa Glögg fonts ID
content:
I think this is kind of a challenge. It’s not a quiz, but given the fact that there are not enough clues, this might be difficult.

Can you identify the 5 fonts used for the numerals on these beautiful bottels?

THX,  
®ené

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907160349im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/blossa-02-04_4333.jpg)

 [‹ bold serif average](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907160349/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41736 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ricall Music Logo Sans Serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907160349/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41732 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Characters

comments.content:
03 could be [Didot Bold Oldstyle Figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907160349/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/didot_lt_std_bold_ot/?sample_text=03&sample_size=288).

[edit] Great, I messed up the link _and_ was too late … ;°)
Great… all done. Warm glass of [glögg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907160349/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mulled_wine) anyone?
The drinks are on me! Thanx for the fantastic help.
